post/2021/A finished Awesomewm post from someone else is better than a draft from me

summary
date

2021-07-27
tags

note/2021
posse

I’ve been revisiting my awesome config, starting by refactoring the default rc.lua. Was even thinking about making a post.

Then I remembered to look at Epsi’s blog, which I already knew to be a great resource for Awesome. And hey Modularized Awesome WM Configuration Structure is the post I want to write, except better. Plenty of other great posts there too.
